resources.string: Dollar Origami Free
Settings
1. Fold a crease in the center to guide you, then fold the right corners over to the center crease.
2. Fold the right corners over again to the center.
3. Flip the bill over.
4. Fold the right corners down.
5. Flip the bill over again.
6. Fold the right side over until the tip touches the middle of the circle.
7. Fold the tip over around halfway so that the tip is at the right edge.
8. Fold the bill in half.
9. Pull the folded tip upward.
10. Pull the nose outward.
11. Unfold the center until the duck can stand up.
12. Congratulations! You have completed your 3-minute dollar origami duck!
1. Fold a crease in the middle to guide you (the green line), then fold the corners diagonally starting at the center (the blue lines).
2. Turn the bill over.
3. Fold the overlapping edges downward.
4. Turn the bill over.
5. Open the main fold to tuck the edge in.
6. Refold the main fold with the edge tucked in, and repeat for the other side.
7. Fold the bill in half along the center line.
8. Fold the center (the green line) forward and the edges (the blue line) back.
9. Congratulations! You have completed your 3-minute dollar origami butterfly!
1. Fold a crease ending in the top right corner.
2. Unfold.
3. Fold a crease ending in the bottom right corner.
4. Unfold.
5. Push the middle of the right half inward, touching the red arrows together so that it makes a triangle along the right side.
6. Fold the left edge over to the edge of the triangle.
7. Fold the tips of the triangle upward.
8. Fold the top and bottom edges of the bill inward.
9. Now for the difficult step: fold the left side over, while at the same time pulling the corners outwardas you pull to make the edge straight.
10. Note that the right side remains folded as you fold the left side over.
10b. When finished, it should look like this.
11. Fold the tips on the left side over.
12. Fold the frog in half.
13. Fold the top edge back.
14. Congratulations! You have completed your 3-minute dollar origami frog! Bonus: push on the back end to make him jump!
